Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

> "Good point, Do what ever is needed to get that information"hissed Hydras
and then opened his comlink to Scorponok"Scorponok, i need that you and
Zarak keep an eye before go into abattle, something is fishi here".


Cyclonus nodded as he resumed his vigil on the screen. With a few taps on
the transmitter he spoke quietly, "What do you have from the beginning of
the battle?"

For a moment the picture goes blank, and then there is the scene once again
of Nightshift moving quickly from the Ark followed quickly by Tuscon and
then by Kup. Cyclonus watched the Ark's shielding flicker and then burst as
Nightshift rolled through, Cyclonus stroked his chin thoughtfully as he
watched it unfold once again, his optics dimming in concentration.

***************************************

Meanwhile . . .

> Nightlight woke up and she looked hersalf being carried by Rodimus to an
unknow place  and she said surpriced"Where we go?"

Rodimus paused for a second before a door, "We're going some place safe." he
said as he looked at Nightlight

He took a moment to readjust her position, and then punched in a security
code, and watched as the rather thick door slid open - yes this room
breathed secure. He placed her on another antigrav cart, one that would give
her a chance to rest and recover.

With a small movement he placed the signature masker on her, "This place
should be safer for you." He looked down at her, "How do you feel?"

(TAG)

Preston

--0016e68dd2824e5642048260026d
